name: Go Nuts
description:
You are a chocolate bar that has come to ruin the lives of the fellow nuts by faceplanting into them and adding them to your collection to make the best chocolate. You can't do this alone though, because you don't have many ways to defend yourself, so you use your companions to help fight for you.

This is my first ever game! Also, I'm 12 Years old so don't be mean, though I will allow constructive criticism. I hope you enjoy :)
